title: Dispatcher
description: Prior experience as a dispatcher (preferably in towing or transportation) is a plus. As a dispatcher, you will be the first point of contact for customers in...

title: Central Dispatcher/Customer Service
benefits: Paid time off, Vision care, Dental care, RRSP match, Casual dress, Extended health care
description: Working directly with customers to book tows and with drivers in all locations, giving call information and clearing.

title: Dispatcher
description: Communicate effectively with drivers, clients, and phone systems to provide updates on shipment status. Provide excellent customer service by addressing inquiries.

title: Dispatcher-NJ
description: Dispatch Associate Service Providers (ASP) and in-house staff to install, service, and repair floor cleaning machines, pressure washers, and balers.

title: Dispatcher
description: Responsible for handling all driver-related communications within assigned and overflow queues. 2+ years of highway dispatch experience required.

title: Truck Dispatcher
benefits: Dental care, Extended health care, On-site parking
description: The ideal candidate will play a crucial role in managing the flow of goods and services within our supply chain.

title: AZ Truck Driver
description: Valid commercial driver's license (AZ) is required. Safely operate a commercial truck to transport freight to designated locations.

title: Class 1 Truck Driver
description: Looking for full-time Class 1 company driver for local and highway work.

title: Quick Route CDL-A Truck Driver Dedicated
benefits: Paid time off, Vision care, Dental care, 401K with company match, Full health benefits including dental, vision, life, etc.
description: CDL-A Truck Drivers get home weekly. Drive dedicated quick routes with competitive pay and benefits.

title: Class 1 Truck Driver (Long Haul Canada-wide)

description: Maintain a clean and organized truck interior and exterior. Operate and drive long-haul trucks to transport freight to various destinations.

title: Regional OTR Truck Driver

description: Morrice Transportation is looking for experienced, professional, and safety-conscious regional OTR truck drivers who can drive at least 10,000 miles monthly.
